review:
I am very grateful to have Dr. Swatishree as my doctor.It is really dificult to find a good doctor who has good knowledge. She is an expert with loads of empathy ,approachable ,hardworking and understanding.She is simple and always with smiling face. 
Everytime I visit her she heard us patiently and answered every question calmly and  keep things simple.
 I felt confident  and comfortable in her care and guidance and was very helpful through out my pregnancy.I would highly recommend Dr. Swatishree  her to my friends and family.

She is very sweet supportive and understanding doctor. I would love to say that she is the best doctor i have ever came across. We are planning to conceive and she is a great support for me and my husband.

Dr. Swati is an experienced and understanding infertility specialist. When I met her, she heard me out patiently and discussed all the possible solutions. She answered all my questions and made sure I was comfortable for the further procedures. With continuous consultation and after multiple sessions, I was able to conceive and birth a healthy child. She helped me and guided me with every step. I would highly recommend Dr. Swati for infertility treatment as well as gynae related consultation.
Doctor is very kind. She has best listening capabilities, helps patients understand problems. I would like to give 100 out of 10 to the doctor as she has solved my problems
Dr. Swati is very friendly. She explained what exactly is the issue that causes pcos. And adviced me on how I need to improve my lifestyle and diet to deal with it.
Doctor was very friendly.  *** **** ********* ***** *** ****** explained the underlying cause, which alleviated our fear.
We are glad that we met Dr Swati. She truly deserves all appreciation and accolades. She is very experienced,calm and professional. *** ** *** **** ************ * ************ ** *****
